entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EPIC] Revisiting HTTPS defaults in ASP.NET Core #41990
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add `IAuthenticationConfigurationProvider.GetAuthenticationConfiguration` #41989
  • Add support for specifying a launch profile to `dotnet watch run` #41988
  • Update project templates so that separate launch profiles for HTTP and HTTPS are configured #41982
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #41980
  • user-jwts should just create the UserSecretsId if not found #41975
  • user LDAP GlobalCatalog to get user groups and add them to ClaimPrincipal. #41974
  • Support O DateTime(Offset) format in dotnet user-jwts tool #41973
  • DataProtection DPAPI NG fails to decrypt values after cloning VM to a different network location #41970
  • EventCallback not initiated #41967
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #41964
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery should word in (non routable) components and two-way #41963
  • Exclude css isolation assets from `dotnet publish` #41961
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • builder.Services.AddHostedService<TimerBackgroundService>(); has no effect #41860
  • RedisHubLifetimeManager OnDisconnectedAsync Exception #41104
    7.0-preview6
  • Cannot load blazor in an angular app #40245
    6.0.x
  • Unable to read appsettings using appcmd.exe #41596
  • .NET 6 Blazor IBrowserFile's OpenReadStream().ReadAsync(buffer) not able to read all bytes #41875
    6.0.x
  • Blazor WASM input time fails to show values after upgrade to .NET 5 #30507
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Remove magic strings from RazorPages routing #41930
  • VS Code: Problem windows has some errors after creating a Razor/Blazor project. #41965
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #41931
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: Updated empty body detection in MVC Model Binding #41014
    Discussions
  • SignalR tests fail against OpenSSL 3.0 #36921
    .NET 7 Planning
  • The respository does not build with `node` version 18 installed. #41571

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport 39275 to release/6.0 #41993
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Backport Blazor boot config fix #41992
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Blazor Make Default Template Favicon Blazor Logo #41991
    area-mvc
  • Add support for reading default scheme from config #41987
  • Mark changes in `.github` folder with `area-infrastructure` label #41981
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "Check the environment on Helix" #41977
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `548b13d` #41969
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `548b13d` #41968
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Fix nullability of TryUpdateModelAsync #41959
    feature-Model-Binding, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add redis startup error handling #41141
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview6
  • Add missing archive files #41941
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/github-script from 3 to 6 #41986
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8d51dc5` to `548b13d` #41983
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 #41984
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/upload-artifact from 1 to 3 #41985
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool and runtime support (#41520) #41956
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix Blazor boot config loading #41976
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview6
  • Quarantines SetIISLimitMaxRequestBodySizeE2EWorksWithIntMaxValue #41846
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix dependabot.yml formatting #41979
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Check the environment on Helix #41971
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview6
  • Remove unused and incorrect P/Invoke #41957
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Update npm dev dependencies to support Node.js 18 #41938
    7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Implemented minimal WebTransport Middleware #41945
  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure
  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix line endings for SPA proxy script on MacOS #41821
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.6
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Update some npm deps #41270
    area-signalr
  • Set Content-Type more accurately in SignalR TS client #41517
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • DataProtection use 6.0 app discriminator trailing slash format #41849
    area-dataprotection
  • Allow returns from all single client proxies #41939
    area-signalr
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Remove unused directory in ANCM installers #41693
    feature-installers, servers-iis
  • Add TBuilder overloads to WithTags and others #41830
    area-runtime
  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • Add RouteHandlerContext.Services property #41952
    area-runtime
